title: Wagamama Onna ni Tensei Shita yo - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Josei   Slice of Life
tags: Childcare   Cooking   Doting Parents   Female Protagonist   Heroes   Lack of Common Sense   Magic   Modern Knowledge   Mysterious Past   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Parent Complex   Technological Gap   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: B.Branch
description: I was the second wife of a noble with a son when I transmigrated. Personality wise, I am a selfish, hot-tempered and hysteric woman. The relationship with my husband is completely cold, an existence shunned by everyone. But, my son is super cute. Because magic seems to be usable here, I will live with my son happily.>
